[En]

Hello! it's Diego Gómez, I have a degree in Chemistry teaching from the Universidad Distrital Francisco José de Caladas (Bogotá-Colombia) and an Ph.D. in Sustainable Chemistry from the Universidad Politécnica de Valencia (Spain). My expertise field is the computational chemistry and I have around six years using ubuntu and several free tools for my daily tasks.

* Spread my feeling and experience with the free software.
* Identify new opportunities for the improvement and/or creation of applications.
